description: This file defines a RoleNotifier class that manages user roles within a Flutter app. It listens to role updates from an AuthService and notifies listeners about changes.

classes.name: RoleNotifier
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that tracks and updates user role information based on the AuthService stream.

methods.name: RoleNotifier
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the notifier with an AuthService instance and starts listening to role changes.

methods.name: role
methods.description: Getter for the current user role.

methods.name: setRole
methods.description: Sets a new user role via the AuthService.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Cancels the role stream subscription and cleans up resources.
